attributes.action: legislate so that MPs cannot avoid rules meant for all UK citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bin Tax, Pay rise restraints -  and other items all seem to be imposed on the UK general public but do not appear to effect those who impose them. Please could legislation be brought in so that rules that effect everyone else in the UK also effect those that introduce these rules - i.e MPs that vote on them.

rejection.details: There are no rules governing pay rises for all UK citizens.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
